system.requirements:
Tier 2; Autosanguine Trait/Implant, Mechanicus Implant. 
Aptitudes: Toughness, Tech, Nurgle
system.effect: The Character can spend 10 minutes in meditation and make a Tech-Use Tetst. If successful they heal 1d5 damage immediately, if they roll 96+, they lose the ability to use their Autosanguine and Prosanguine for one week.

description.value: The Character can spend 10 minutes in meditation and make a Tech-Use Tetst. If successful they heal 1d5 damage immediately, if they roll 96+, they lose the ability to use their Autosanguine and Prosanguine for one week.
